suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de teste 04 - Editar quantidade dos produtos selecionados após adicionar ao carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que o usuário realiza a pesquisa pelo site "www.amazon.com.br" utilizando o chrome
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.
kw.msg: Keyword 'Set Screenshot Directory' found both from a custom library 'SeleniumLibrary' and a standard library 'Screenshot'. The custom keyword is used. To select explicitly, and to get rid of this warning, use either 'SeleniumLibrary.Set Screenshot Directory' or 'Screenshot.Set Screenshot Directory'.

kw.name: E pesquisa por bola de futebol penalty no campo de busca na região superior do site
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'bola de futebol penalty' into text field '//input[contains(@type,'text')]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
